1.title: Midnight on Gallifrey

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Whilst writing the episode "Hell Bent" for BBC's "Doctor Who", head writer Steven Moffat accidentally makes Gallifrey, the Time War and the evil Rassilon, real. Rassilon takes his new found existence and uses to to kidnap who he thinks are the real Doctor's, actors Paul McGann, Christopher Eccleston, Matt Smith and Tom Baker.

2.title: Sherlock's Revenge

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Sherlock is back, with a want to torment the Doctor's who had got him put away for murder the year before.

3.title: Eccleston's Friendly Prop Shop

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Steven Moffat gives The Doctor's an offer to make an advert for a product of there choice, Eccleston immediately takes the offer.

4.title: Inside the Game

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Matt Smith, Rick Grimes, Starlord and Christopher Eccleston are transported into the computer and have to play the games they were put in (Minecraft, Call of Duty, Mario Bros and Batman Arkham Asylum, respectively) in order to get out.

5.title: The Matt Hatter

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: The Mad Hatter finds his way into Doctor Who Road, and immediately uses Matt Smith's love of hats to his advantage, taking over his mind, as well as the rest of the roads inhabitants. Who will stop him?

6.title: Left 4 Who

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: In this one off Halloween Special, all but 4 of the Doctor's are turned into zombies, in an obvious homage to the game "Left 4 Dead", and they must battle there way through the infected to the next safe house.

7.title: Doctor Who VS Chibnall Trilogy

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Steven Moffat is finally on his way out, he invites his replacement, Chris Chibnall, to celebrate the handing over of power. But when he leaves, it descends into chaos.

8.title: Trapped

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: A prequel of sorts to "Doctor Who VS Chibnall", 4 Doctor's are locked in a room and must answer a series of questions from some odd characters in order to escape.

9.title: Worlds Had Enough of Chris

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: After the events of "Doctor Who VS Chibnall", Eccleston has been imprisoned in the newly discovered Villain House, which the, now trapped, Steven Moffat converted into a Cybermen Factory. In a parody of the "Doctor Who" episode "World Enough and Time", Eccleston takes the Bill Potts role as he waits for the others to come and save him before he is converted into a Cyberman. Will they be to late?

10.title: Costume Wizard

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The events of "Doctor Who VS Chibnall" are still taking it's toll as Paul McGann has been stripped of his costume, but as luck would have it, both him and Peter Davison get an invitation to the Costume dimension, to meet the mysterious Costume Wizard, to help sort them out.

11.title: Vanity and the Scarf

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: David Tennant, manipulated by an unknown force, has his vanity pushed to the forefront of every decision he makes, which leads him to create a Doctor Who museum to boost his face out there when it gets popular. He just needs one last display piece. Tom Baker's scarf.

12.title: Physicians Fears

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot:
Know what this is about?

13.title: Tennant, Meet The Doctor

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: David Tennant spots an unfamiliar face in the back garden and discovers a strange man claiming to be The Doctor, a strange conversation ensues.

14.title: Moffats Revenge

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: After 3 Years of Sketches and 55 Years of Doctor Who. The ultimate evil (Steven Moffat) escapes his prison, and builds a team of The Doctor's villains to reap his revenge. Can The Doctor's, not only survive, but possibly escape Doctor Who Road? Find out in MOFFATS REVENGE.

3.title: Doctor Who VS Moffat Part 3

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Matt Smith, David Tennant, Christopher Eccleston, Peter Capaldi and Paul McGann, face off against Steven Moffat in the finale to the Doctor Who VS Moffat Trilogy.

4.title: The Answer to Rory's Death

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Matt Smith and Arthur Darvil, are determined to find out why the Character Arthur plays keeps dying, and goes on an adventure to find the truth.

5.title: How to Keep Fit with The Doctor

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: David Tennant creates a brief and humorous fitness video to show people how to be as fit as a Timelord (AKA, himself).

6.title: Doctor Who Road Trilogy

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot:

7.title: Fear Moff

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Moffat has gone insane and is sealing people away in paper, much like in the 2006 Doctor Episode "Fear her", Matt Smith is taken by him and it's up to his friends to save him.

8.title: Capaldi's Revenge

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: When Peter Capaldi find out Clara has been killed off in Doctor Who, he goes on a rampage and recruits the "New Who" Doctor's, to help him kill Steven Moffat.

9.title: The Casting of The Doctor

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: As David Tennant leaves the show, him, Russell T Davies and Steven Moffat must cast a new Doctor, and the three of them judge the actors who audition.

10.title: Moffat's Leaving

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Steven Moffat wants to leave as head writer of Doctor Who, and tasks Mark Gatiss to give the job to his successor, Chris Chibnall. But it doesn't go as smoothly as he would've hoped.

11.title: Ecclestons Shed Mystery (Part 1 and 2)

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Eccleston's home, the shed, for the last 10 years goes missing. And its up to him to get to the bottom of this mystery, by interviewing and deducting until he finds out whodunit.

12.title: Terrence Day

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Terrence reminisces on the passing of his father, but when given a small time travelling device, decides to go back in time to attempt to stop it from happening, much like in Doctor Who's episode Fathers Day from 2005.

13.title: Can The Doctor Lift Thor's Hammer?

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: A Mysterious Hammer appears in Doctor Who Road, it's Thor's Hammer from the MARVEL Film Franchise. But instead of worrying about where it came from, they choose to each try and lift it, to see if anyone's worthy.

14.title: Doctor's Assemble (Parts 1 and 2)

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: The Doctor's must find a super power around the garden in order to fight off the evil threat in the sky, AKA, the face of Harry Dunkley, in this epic 2 Part story.

15.title: Eccleston's Revenge

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Eccleston goes through old photo's of his old shed, remembering the good old days, when David and Matt surprise him with a brand new abode in the back of the garden. But that doesn't make up for the fact that they destroyed the old one. It's time for some good old fashioned revenge.

16.title: Sherlock's Murder Mystery

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: The murder of Russell T Davies, by an unknown murderer, prompts Detective Sherlock Holmes to enter the Doctor Who Road in order to solve the mystery.

17.title: Doctor Who VS Jack

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Jack Reeves and his girlfriend Siobhan Webb are mysteriously transported into the world Jack created. Doctor Who Road. They are forced by the unseen evil force of Harry Dunkley to go through multiple challenges in order to escape.

18.title: Regen Bonanza (Parts 1 and 2)

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Eccleston's killing in the previous episode "Doctor Who VS Jack" has caused Head Writer and owner of Doctor Who Road to make all the actor's regenerate, much like they do in the TV show they once starred in.

19.title: CHRISmas Eccleston

episode of.title: Doctor Who Road: Sketch Universe (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: It's Christmas time in Doctor Who Road, and Santa finds to his a surprise that it exists, but when he tries to delivers the Doctor's presents, he gets accidentally murdered by Eccleston, who thinks it best to take the mantle for the night and become CHRISmas Eccleston.
